quest.name: Suited for Affection
journal:
Lisette de Valentione's gaze is sultry, yet her eyes wander uneasily.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Lisette de Valentione, vaunted emissary of love and ardor, is having sister trouble─to wit, said sister is being stubbornly insistent that she relieve Lisette of her Valentione's Day duties this year. Upon further inquiry, you discover that her demand stems from a desire to allow Lisette time with her own beloved during this season of romance. After you pledge your support to Astrid, Lisette finally consents to her younger sister's wishes, counseling her to stay true to her heart as she fulfills her duty as an emissary of affection.

Now wearing her sister's proverbial shoes, Astrid asks you to accompany her colleague, an emissary-in-training named Emilie, on a promotional tour around Gridania. You speak to Emilie to get started, but not before you take note of the cheerful determination on Astrid's face─and her uncharacteristically frilly outfit.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

You and Emilie set off towards the Leatherworkers' Guild to begin your advertising campaign. The lilt of a haltingly improvised love poem tells you Astrid is also hard at work.

※You must be accompanied by Emilie to complete this task. Speak with her again should you become separated.
You managed to snag the interest of a Gridanian resident with your enthusiastic pitch. Next, Emilie suggests you head towards the Shaded Bower.
You secure another participant for the festivities, but Emilie seems somewhat thrown by his compliment. Shaking off her reaction, she proclaims the Centaur's Eye as your next destination.

Emilie successfully invites another potential merrymaker, but in the next breath confesses her uneasiness towards her own state of dress. In truth, she admits, she would rather wear something “adorable” rather than “handsome,” but felt it her supporting duty to contrast Lady Astrid's attire. After encouraging her to share her true feelings with Astrid, you part ways for a time to let Emilie gather her thoughts.

You meet Emilie back at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre only to find Lady Astrid looking rather bedraggled. Apparently, receiving the attentions inspired of her “adorable” outfit has been exhausting, and yet she feels it is her duty as Lady Lisette's successor to weather it nonetheless. Emilie takes this chance to admit her own discomfort, and you both urge Astrid to consider that love of one's natural preferences is as worthy a love as any other. Astrid is bolstered by your encouragement and vows to become the sort of emissary she is best suited to become─after changing into a suit herself, that is. Exchanging outfits, Astrid and Emilie continue facilitating this year's Valentione's Day celebrations with undeniable and radiant confidence.
objectives: Speak with Emilie and have her accompany you.
Speak with Gridanian residents while accompanied by Emilie.
Speak with Gridanian residents while accompanied by Emilie again.
Speak with Gridanian residents while accompanied by Emilie yet again.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text:
As dawnlight kisses sky above,
So too eternal beams my love.
Though dusk may drown the world in grey,
The night shall taste─
...Why, hello there!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: If it isn't my hero of zeal, my champion of cherishers! 'Tis ever a pleasure to meet you in this rosiest of seasons.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: You, my dear adventurer, have the unmistakable gleam of a womanman who would champion the cause of love─of Valentione's Day!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: If you have a moment, I should be much obliged to hear your thoughts upon a certain matter of the heart. Of my heart, to be precise...

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: You see, my sister Astrid has been demanding to lead the celebrations this year. Yet while her enthusiasm does her credit, I simply cannot shirk my responsibilities as head emissary of ardor!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: No matter what I say, she refuses to budge on the matter, but perhaps she would heed reason were it to come from an impartial party─and such a charming one at that! So I beg you, will you not try to talk some sense into her?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I heard what my sister told you, but I simply must be allowed to oversee the festivities this year! I have my reasons!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Lisette herself has a love. Yet she devotes all her time and energy to the happiness of others when she should be focusing on her own!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I must confess, I didn't always approve of my sister's choice of partner. With his lowly upbringing, I had believed Hortefense didn't deserve her.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: But through my work as an emissary, I've come to realize that such things as birth and station matter not so long as there is love.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: And you should be embracing this occasion to foster that love instead of worrying about others!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: <sigh> Look here, Astrid. I appreciate your concern, I do, but the reputation of House Valentione hinges on the success of these celebrations.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: As lady of the house, I've labored to ensure that everything has gone smoothly, year in and year out. Failure is not an option─you understand this, yes?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I know this full well, Sister, and I won't fail us. I even have the assistance of our new emissary-in-training.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: ...What do you think, adventurer?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I say leave it to Astrid. And if it'd make you feel better, I'll help too.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Will this emissary-in-training spend more time helping or, you know...training?

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Well now, who am I to turn away an offer of help from such a charming adventurer?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I must say, the thought did cross my mind...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: ...Then, would you be willing to assist us too, adventurer? Yours would be a most reassuring presence in our efforts!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Yes, with your good self watching over Astrid, I believe I can entrust this year's celebration to her with an easy heart!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: I hereby leave our legacy in your hands. So long as you stay true to your heart, you will surely do us proud.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: And even should something go awry, fret not─there is little I cannot fix with my indubitable charms.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Right, then...

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: I suppose I'll go and...embrace the spirit of the season.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Whew! With Lisette gone, we may finally begin our work. Speaking of which, I must immediately impose upon you.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Originally, I was meant to make the rounds with Emilie, our new recruit, to advertise the event we shall be hosting later on.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: However, now that I have officially assumed my sister's responsibilities, I'm required to remain here at her post. Might you accompany Emilie in my stead?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Thank you! Pray wait a moment while I fetch her!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Ahem! In love's fine season, our task is one─to spread gay tidings to all and...one? Erm, allow me to present our new apprentice of affection!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Yes, well, the dress is quite a departure from my usual attire. But if I am to follow in Lisette's footsteps, I naturally must adopt her lovely image!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Nice to meet you, adventurer! My name is Emilie, and it will be my pleasure to advertise the festivities together.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Let Emilie know when you are ready to, er...fly forth upon the wings of ardor and spread the word of our happy congregation!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Go forth, my sweet cherubs of passion! Deliver your messages of love and, er...return hither once you're done!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Shall we be off, then?

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: This being my first time promoting an event, I'm not certain how to start talking to strangers... May I ask you to take the lead?

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Thank you! I'll be sure to observe you closely. Now then, shall we first head to the Leatherworkers' Guild? I daresay some folk there will be interested in our event.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSA04654
dialogue.text: Looks like I'm early. Wonder if there's something to do to pass the time...

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSA04654
dialogue.text: Looks like I'm early. Wonder if there's something to do to pass the time...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Come and celebrate Valentione's Day with us!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Hearken thee, for Valentione's Day, that grand celebration of ardor and affection, is come once more!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Lali-ho!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Cheerful and to the point─that, I can do!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Amazing! I can imagine Lisette herself delivering such a delightful invitation!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Lali...ho? I-I am not familiar with its meaning, but how unique!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Erm... Valentione's Day celebrations are being held at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre! There will be costumes and merrymaking and a special congregation wherein participants profess their love! Please join us if you have the time.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSA04654
dialogue.text: Well now, that does sound like fun! I'll head over at once. My thanks for letting me know!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: That went well! Let's keep up the good work!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Next, let's head to the Shaded Bower, on the way to the markets. Oh, and I shall try taking the lead this time─your example was most inspiring!

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSB04654
dialogue.text: Aaah, nothing feels so fine as finishing up a good day's work!

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSB04654
dialogue.text: Aaah, nothing feels so fine as finishing up a good day's work!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Come and celebrate Valentione's Day with us!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Hearken thee, for Valentione's Day, that grand celebration of ardor and affection, is come once more!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: L-Lali-ho!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: We are hosting Valentione's Day celebrations at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre! Come join us for refreshments, costumes, and a special event wherein participants proclaim their affections.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSB04654
dialogue.text: A handsome invitation from a handsome lass! How could I refuse? I'll bring my wife too─she loves her festivals!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: W-Wonderful! We look forward to seeing you there!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: "Handsome“... If anything, I wanted to be winsome.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: I'll just have to try harder next time, I suppose...

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Well, let's make our way through the Ebony Stalls and to the Centaur's Eye.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSC04654
dialogue.text: When they say “the quickest way to the heart is through the stomach,” do they mean with chocolates, or...?

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: A very good eveningmorningday to you, miss! Do you not simply adore this sweet season of ardor and affection?

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSC04654
dialogue.text: Oh! You're one of the Valentione's Day people, I take it?

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Indeed I am! Over at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre, we are hosting a delightful event with gorgeous costumes to try on and an opportunity to speak of love to your heart's content!

dialogue.name: RESIDENTSC04654
dialogue.text: Well now, what a passionate and dashing emissary you are! Thank you for the invitation─and good luck with the festivities!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: ...Dashing? <sigh>

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: I know it was said in kindness, but I just... No. This is no time to complain─not when Astrid's trying so hard to do her sister proud.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: She was hesitant about the dress─said that such attire doesn't become her─but she donned it anyway in order to be like Lisette. And she positively shines in it, don't you think?

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: It was to help her shine even brighter that I decided to wear this suit.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: I believed it would serve to provide contrast when we're side by side onstage.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: But this─this simply isn't me. I've always preferred to look ladylike. Adorable. And being called “handsome” and “dashing” reminds me how far from myself I am right now. I need to persevere, I know this. It isn't the time to be selfish. And yet...

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I don't think having preferences is selfish.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I'm sure Astrid would want you to feel comfortable.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Truly? Then perhaps...I will speak with Astrid about it.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: I'll need a moment to gather my thoughts, but let's meet back at the amphitheatre shortly!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: ...A-Adorable? 'Tis very kind of you to compliment me so. Yes, very kind indeed... P-Please enjoy the festivities!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: I tried gathering my thoughts...but I still don't know how I should broach the subject with Astrid.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, I'm determined to speak with her, and I would be grateful for your presence.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: W-Welcome back, my messengers of...messages. How fared your efforts?

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Oh, splendidly! We met many souls eager to celebrate this season of love. But...if I may, there's something I wished to discuss with you...

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: ...L-Later, perhaps. You're looking a little pale, Astrid. Are you feeling well?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Oh, er─fret not, Emilie! I am simply blanched with anticipation for today's most lovely events! Peaked with pleasure, as it were! Er...weak with, I mean!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: ...Oh, who am I fooling? The truth is, people have been bombarding me with compliments on my appearance. Every second person says that I look “sweet” or “adorable,” and it's been positively exhausting.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: As a daughter of nobility, I know I ought to desire such praise─beauty and grace are highly commendable virtues in our circles, after all.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: But one day, I met a knight─a fellow daughter of a noble house─and I found myself drawn to her strength and gallantry.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Our famous ancestor Countess Arabelle was also a skilled warrior, you know. Alas, I've never had the physical disposition for such a rigorous calling.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: And though I find comfort in incorporating the spirit of chivalry into my guise and mannerism, if I'm to be an emissary worthy of succeeding Lisette, I must accept the attire that comes with the position, and set aside my own preferences.

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Emilie would be happy to trade outfits with you!

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Embracing one's own preferences is also an expression of love─self-love.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Uwaaah! Wh-What are you doing!? M-My thoughts─must gather my thoughts!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: It may be said that to prefer is to love. Still, as an emissary, I can't allow my personal concerns to interfere with duty.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: ...Ahem. Astrid. I know your feelings all too well...for I have them too, though in reverse to you.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: I find it uplifting to be called “sweet” or “adorable.” Yet I feel anything but in this “handsome” suit...

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: As emissaries of love, our duty is to help people embrace their hearts. But how are we to do this if we don't embrace our own? If we don't love ourselves and pursue our own happiness?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: You're right, Emilie. You're absolutely right.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: There I was, chiding Lisette for ignoring her own happiness. Yet here I am, guilty of doing the very same thing...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: In order to become a great emissary like my sister, I had believed that I needed to emulate her completely. But that isn't the case.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: No, as my sister herself advised, I need to stay true to my heart.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Only then can I hope to become the best emissary that I can be!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Were it not for your encouragement, Astrid and I might have continued to be miserable, trying to be someone we're not. Thank you for helping us to be true to ourselves!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Come, Emilie! Let us trade outfits at once!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Just so... To succeed someone doesn't mean you have to imitate them. Now that Astrid has learned this, she's truly ready to take over the Valentione legacy.

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: Which means we can start considering our future in earnest. Among other things, I still need to pay my respects to your family.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Y-Yes, well, we'll get around to it soon enough. Ishgard wasn't built in a day, you know...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the Valentione's Ceremony seasonal instance! To enter the venue, speak with the House Valentione servant at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Valentione's Ceremony is an instance designed for a party of two. There are no class, job, or level requirements for participation.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In the event that you register for the ceremony alone, your partner will be found via the matching system.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Emilie is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Emilie behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Emilie accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: While you are accompanied, you may encounter “conversation points” along the way which offer additional topics of discussion.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Enter the glowing area and speak with your quest companions to initiate these bonus conversations. Enjoy exploring your surroundings together!

dialogue.name: Q5
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Discuss Valentione's Day.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Discuss gifts.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Discuss the Centaur's Eye.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Speak with Emilie.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Part ways with Emilie.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Look, you can just see the amphitheatre from here. I simply love Valentione's Day─the soft colors, the hearts, the adorable costumes...

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: I'm so glad I found the courage to ask Lisette if I could become an emissary! It's nothing short of a dream come true.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: There's no shortage of Valentione's gifts to choose from at the markets. By all accounts, the most popular chocolate is from the Bismarck.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Are you planning to give a special someone a gift too? Assuming you have the skills, they say nothing conveys your feelings quite like chocolates you made yourself. And if you're thinking flowers, a red Azeyma rose never fails to please!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: This is my brother-in-law's shop! He proposed to my sister on Valentione's Day, and they've been inseparable ever since!

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Let's do our best to gather a big crowd!

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Emilie?

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Have urgent business, do you? Very well, I'll wait for you at the amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: EMILIE
dialogue.text: Ah, you're back. Let's be off again.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be accompanied by Emilie and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Emilie has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
